collection.title: Collection
collection.introduction:
UNIQUE - SUSTAINABLE - CRAFTSMANSHIP - TIMELESS with SURPRISING ACCENTS

The Aimant, Maisa, HaHaHandbag and the classic doctor's bag models are available to order.

The permanent color collection can be found per model, with your order I will contact you about the color of the haberdashery, the leather on the magnets and the length of the strap. On request you can also have your name printed in the bag.

aimant.description:
A sturdy handbag in vegetable tanned leather with a large volume.
The flap closes with 3 magnets that can be covered in a different color as desired.
The bottom has 4 legs and the shoulder strap is adjustable.
aimant.detail-description:
Dimensions: W 26.5 cm - H 20 cm - D 8 cm

Available in
• brown with magnets in red leather and bronze fittings, the shoulder strap is min. 99 cm and max. 110 cm
• blue with magnets in eggplant and bronze fittings, the shoulder strap is min. 96 cm and max. 110 cm

Price: 475 euros

aimant-small.description:
A sturdy handbag made of vegetable tanned leather.
The flap closes with 2 magnets that can be covered in a different color as desired.
The small version does not contain bag feet as standard.
aimant-small.detail-description:
Dimensions: W 20.50 cm - H 16 cm - D 7 cm (narrowing)

Available in
• pink and natural with matt silver fittings, the shoulder strap is min. 98 cm and max. 110 cm
• blue and aubergine with gold fittings, the shoulder strap is min. 98 cm and max. 110 cm

Price: 395 euros

maisa.description:
A playful handbag in supple vegetable tanned leather. The bag closes with a flap that contains two blind magnets. The bag is light and super handy for daily use. You can choose between a small and medium version. A zippered bag can be incorporated upon request. The strap is attached to the bag in 3 different ways.

1. at fixed length
2. one side fixed and the other adjustable with gun buttons
3. adjustable on both sides with gun buttons
maisa.detail-description:
Dimensions Maisa small: W 24 cm - H 16 cm - D 11 cm (narrower)

Directly available in
• pink with matt silver fittings and inner pocket with zipper, adjustable strap on one side: 96cm up to 101cm (can be adjusted to your preference)
310 euros
• natural with red accents and silver-colored fittings, fixed belt of 100cm (can be adjusted to wish)
275 euro

Dimensions Maisa medium: W 26.50 cm - H 20 cm - D 11 cm (tapering)

Color chart Maisa: vegetable tanned leather type 'Vegline '
bottle green - soft pink - emerald green - chocolate brown - rust - mimosa (natural)

other colors/leather types on request
